features.text:
# Attributions

Concept, scripting and basic modeling by Zero Pointer. Other models used are listed below. Big thanks to all the wonderful people creating 3D models for free use!

## Sun, planet and stars textures

Solar System Scope

https://www.solarsystemscope.com/textures/
